common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define:
Dispute return.

Support to raise dispute when return_status in REQUESTED / PROCESSING/ACCEPTED

error_list.name: dispute.request.param.error
error_list.description: Can't raise dispute because the dispute reason is empty

error_list.name: dispute.request.param.error
error_list.description: can't raise dispute because the requirement and dispute reason ID does not match

error_list.name: dispute.request.param.error
error_list.description: Invalid images, images max size is 3 per module

error_list.name: dispute.request.param.error
error_list.description: Unable to raise dispute as mandatory module index is missing

error_list.name: returnsn.illegal
error_list.description: Return status does not allow initiating a dispute case（From dispute side）

error_list.name: dispute.request.param.error
error_list.description: can't raise dispute because mandatory evidence is missing

error_list.name: dispute.request.param.error
error_list.description: Can't raise dispute because the return_sn and dispute_reason_id does not match.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query offer info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query order info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query proof info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query return info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Get user info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Return SN or ID is invalid.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: The return case is missing initial evidence from the buyer and will be auto-cancelled if the buyer does not provide evidence by the due date.

error_list.name: error_return_status
error_list.description: Cannot raise dispute because return SN is not in REQUESTED, RETURN_PROCESSING, or RETURN_ACCEPTED

error_list.name: dispute.request.param.error
error_list.description: Key: 'XXX' Error:Field validation for 'XX' failed on the 'required' tag

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Shopee is reviewing the case and will get back to you.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: The return you queried doesn't exist.

error_list.name: dispute.request.param.error
error_list.description: The return_sn you requested was not queried, please check it

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Shopee is reviewing the case and will get back to you.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Please link shop and partner on seller center.

{"request_params":[{"name":"return_sn","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"24112301K66SQXM","type":"string","description":"The serial number of return.","key":"PDjrNHz"},{"name":"email","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"test@example.com","type":"string","description":"

The email address.

","key":"psXbtrx"},{"description":"

The dispute reason id.

Please call v2.returns.get_return_dispute_reason to get it.

","name":"dispute_reason_id","sample":"50","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"bhPbTCG"},{"description":"

The evidence images.

","name":"image_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"False","key":"mjNijGd","children":[{"description":"

The module_index of current evidence module returned by get_return_dispute_reason API.

","name":"module_index","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":"True","key":"JfGYiYS"},{"description":"

The requirement content of current evidence module returned by get_return_dispute_reason API.

The image URLs of current evidence module. It is recommended to pass in the URL returned by convert_image API.

The content of dispute reason.

","key":"ZekyHtM"}],"response_params":[{"sample":"openapi-e3e3e7f3291217bb0b0d5a1ffe501701:0100027ec9bf2af2:00000016da662a54","type":"string","name":"request_id","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"ykZhMaN"},{"sample":" ","type":"string","name":"error","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"SpkPYxx"},{"sample":" ","type":"string","name":"message","description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"YTQyRFk"},{"sample":"","type":"object","description":"","name":"response","children":[{"sample":"200203171852695","type":"string","name":"return_sn","description":"

The serial number of return.

","key":"EYnihKX"},{"description":"","name":"msg","sample":"dispute return success","type":"string","required":null,"key":"PcRjxXW"}],"key":"pfbCTB"}]}

update_log_list.content: sunset the request filed "dispute_reason", please follow the new flow to raise dispute, may refer https://open.shopee.cn/announcements/883
